name: Aladdin: Magic Racer
description:
Fly magic carpets through wild race tracks in some of the most beautiful environments ever! Elude your opponents' attacks and traps, take sharp turns, and fly to victory!

Features

• 4 game modes and 16 races full of thrills!
• Can be played with the Wii Remote or the Wii Balanace Board.
• Up to 4 players can play simultaneously!
